ygData.subject: Congrats Beld!
ygData.msgSnippet: Just got the new digest, and saw you had reached 50 at last , Beld, CONGRATS!!  I can only imagine what it will be like to be 50th level, hehe, almost to 21st
ygData.messageBody:
Just got the new digest, and saw you had reached 50 'at last', Beld, CONGRATS!!  I can only imagine what it will be like to be 50th level, hehe, almost to 21st myself.  Starting to feel like my character is starting to come into his own, and being worthwhile to play, cannot wait until I get the 22nd level spells, really looking forward to Vampiric Embrace and Engulfing Darkness.  BTW, for those who are new to the list, and have not read Beld's article on how to use Harm Touch, I highly recommend it.  To find it, go to www.eqforge.com, and look under the knight watch, guides.
 
Again, Beld, Congrats!!
 
Good Hunting!,
 
Tvar S'Vex, Council of the Griffin Lords
20th Dark Elf ShadowKnight
Povar
